channel.title: Compiler Running error (not caused by java files)
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/sun/tools/javac/M ain Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.sun.tools.javac.Main at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: com.sun.tools.javac.Main. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I am getting this error whilst running my compile.bat

item.source: Compiler Running error (not caused by java files)

item.title: Compiler Running error (not caused by java files)
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“dddylan98, post:4, topic:427272”]@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_29\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp clientlibs.jar -sourcepath . *.java pause[/quote]

I don’t think this will fix it, but:

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_29\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp .; clientlibs.jar -sourcepath . *.java

Look at what the error says:

com/sun/tools/javac/Main

Make sure your source has a Main class.

Read full topic
